CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL($User.UserType ,'Standard') , HYPERLINK("/lightning/cmp/c__IFB_ViewPrimeDetail?c__recordId="+Id+"&c__sn="+Name,"View Card Data","_self"), IF(ISPICKVAL( $User.UserType ,'PowerPartner'), HYPERLINK("/MyFirstBuddy/s/creditcarddetails?c__recordId="+Id+"&c__sn="+Name,"View Card Data","_self"),''))
CustomField.label: View Card Data
